verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Everybody likes to take a holiday, newline everybody likes to take a rest newline Spending time together with the family newline Sharing lots of love and happiness.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Come on ring those bells, light the Christmas tree, newline Jesus is the King, born for you and me. newline Come on ring those bells, everybody say, newline Jesus, we remember it's Your birthday

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Celebrations come because of something good. newline Celebrations we love to recall newline Mary had a baby boy in Bethlehem newline The greatest celebration of them all.
